summary: Partners page bug fix validation completed successfully. The missing Card and Handshake imports have been resolved, and the Partners page now loads correctly without errors. All other pages remain functional with excellent UI/UX design.

ui_bugs.issue: Demo account buttons redirect to login page instead of authenticating user automatically

integration_issues.issue: Demo login flow requires manual credential entry instead of automatic authentication

passed_tests: Partners page loads correctly without error messages (BUG FIXED)
Partners page displays partner tier statistics (Museum, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Total)
Homepage loads with hero section and active countdown timer
Exhibitors page displays correctly with proper navigation
Login page shows proper form elements and demo account options
Demo accounts page displays 11 demo options with proper UI
News page loads with articles from siportevent.com
Events page shows event listings correctly
Networking page loads with proper content
Media/Webinars page displays content with statistics (17 webinars, 2,860 views, 14h duration)
Navigation between all pages working smoothly
Professional UI/UX design maintained across all pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Partners page bug successfully fixed! Only remaining issue: Demo login authentication flow needs to automatically authenticate users instead of redirecting to login page.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (15/16 major features working correctly, Partners page bug resolved)
